headline: American Tower, Crown Castle downgraded as EchoStar disputes cloud tower leasing
summary: Investing.com -- Barclays downgraded American Tower and Crown Castle to Equal Weight, saying the tower companies face rising uncertainty over their ability to collect rent tied to EchoStar, which could push 2026 growth lower and limit prospects for a near term re-rating. Brokerage kept its Overweight on SBA Communications, which it said has less exposure to the dispute.
